needs: Fatima aims to deliver measurable marketing outcomes while managing ambiguity and aligning cross-functional teams. She focuses on reducing costs, improving KPIs swiftly, and scaling successful strategies through data-driven experiments. Her part-time role requires efficient prioritization and accountability, maintaining simplicity and transparency in processes within budget constraints around $800K.
personality: Fatima communicates with directness and transparency, valuing data-driven decisions and continuous learning. She fosters collaboration through clear expectations, documentation, and mentoring while embracing experimentation to resolve uncertainties early. Her style emphasizes simplicity, readable workflows, and humane processes that respect clear accountability and iterative improvement paced by honest metrics.
